overview: Seven nurses, one more exciting than the other. While playing with each other, they give life to their patients and entertain their colleagues. They give each other unknown pleasures and with the help of a double dildo they explore each other’s deepest secrets and desires. Tara, the head nurse, gives a striptease that increases the heart rate of a surgeon. Moments later we see her again with two of her colleagues for a truly unforgettable double penetration. Surrender to these wonderful nurses in their white coats, they will give your libido a new life!
title: 7 Hungry Nurses
